boat.construction_details: Carvel larch on sawn oak, elm keel is original.
boat.full_description: Length 37ft.5 (excluding bowsprit) beam 10ft.5 draft 4ft.9, 'Mary' is built in carvel construction larch and oak planking on oak frames.
boat.name: Mary
boat.short_description: 'Mary' had her second full rebuild by Brian Kennell and Shaun White, Downs Boatyard, Maldon, 1996 - 2000. She is the only surviving example of an Essex oyster smack with a lute stern, reputed to have been built in 1844 and rebuilt in 1900.
